content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper plate mine at position(-46.5, 70.5)
Consists of electric mining drill at position(-46.5, 70.5) and small electric pole at position(-44.5, 68.5)

### Military science pack production at position(15.5, 0.5)
Consists of assembling machine 2 at position(15.5, 0.5), input inserter at position(17.5, 0.5), output inserter at position(13.5, 0.5), output chest at position(12.5, 0.5), and input chest at position(18.5, 0.5)

### Piercing rounds magazine production at position(-42.5, 2.5)
Consists of assembling machine2 at position(-42.5, 2.5), input inserter at position(-40.5,2.5), output inserter at position(-44.5,2.5), output chest at position(-45.5,2.5), and input chest at position(-39.5, 2.5)

### Firearm magazine production at position(-38.5, 6.5)
Consists of assembling machine2 at position(-38.5,6.5), input inserter at position(-36.5,6.5), output inserter at position(-40.5,6.5), and output chest at position(-41.5,6.5)

### Iron plate production line at position(-47,9)
Consists of furnace at position(-47.0,9.0), input inserter at position(-45.5,9.5), output inserter at position(-48.5,9.5) and output chest at position(-49.5,9.5)

### Electricity generator at position(-4.5, -2.0)
Consists of offshore pump at position(-9.5, -2.5), boiler at position(-4.5, -2.0), steam engine at position(0.5, 0.5), and a network of pipes connecting the offshore pump to the boiler and the boiler to the steam engine. Small electric poles are present at positions (-1.5, 1.5) and (2.5, 0.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting power
- Ensure the entity is connected to a valid power source and the entity is powered

### Errors when providing ingredients for production
- Ensure that the required ingredients are available in the inventory before providing them

### Errors when placing a new entity
- Ensure the target position is not occupied by another entity

### Errors when crafting an item
- Ensure all required sub-ingredients are available and can be crafted before attempting to craft an item

### Errors when mining resources
- Ensure you are at the resource position before mining

### Errors when an entity is not connected to the required for production

### Errors when list index out of range
- Ensure that the list indices used in the code are within the valid range

### Errors due to undefined variables
- Ensure all variables are defined before using them

### Errors when an entity is not connected to a power source
- Ensure a valid power source is available and connected to the entity

### Errors due to undefined names
- Ensure that all names used in the code are defined

### Errors when using 'self' without definition
- Ensure 'self' is used within a class definition

### Errors when checking entity at a specific position
- Ensure the entity exists at the specified position before attempting to access it

### Errors due to undefined entity
- Ensure the entity is defined before using it

### Errors when the target position is too far away to place an entity
- Ensure you move closer to the target position before placing an entity

### Errors due to NameError
- Ensure that all names used in the code are defined and valid

### Errors when rebuilding critical infrastructure
- Ensure the target location is clear of obstacles before rebuilding

## NAMESPACE

No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
